House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00135
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ERRATIC OPERATIONS OF MAJOR POWER PLANTS AND TO DETERMINE THE STATUS OF POWER SUPPLY IN THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VELASCO, LORD ALLAN JAY Q.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-10-06
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-02-27
          -Chairman Velasco requested the Department of Energy to furnish the Committee with the result of the Technical Audit Report conducted and an update of the power supply situation on the Visayas and Mindanao grid. The stakeholders manifested their support on the resolution in order to ensure sufficient, stable and affordable supply of power in the country. The Committee deferred deliberation of the measure pending submission of the requested documents.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2016-09-19
